rdfreader.exceptions module¶

exception rdfreader.exceptions.InvalidMoleculeError¶

Bases: Exception

Raised when the mol block string is not a valid mol block string.

exception rdfreader.exceptions.InvalidReactionError¶

Bases: Exception

Raised when the reaction block string is not a valid reaction block string.

class rdfreader.rdf.RDFParser(f: TextIOWrapper, header_format_string: str = 'IIIIIIPPPPPPPPPMMDDYYYYHHmmRRRRRRR', except_on_invalid_molecule: bool = True, except_on_invalid_reaction: bool = True, rdf_file_name: str = '', parse_conditions: bool = True)¶

Bases: object

lineno: int = 1¶
next_reaction()¶

Returns the next rxn block from a rdf file.

Parameters¶

fTextIOWrapper

The file to parse.

Returns¶

tuple[str, str, int]

The rxn block, the rxn id, and the line number of the start of the rxn block.

rdfreader.write module¶

rdfreader.write.write_rdf(f: TextIOWrapper, rxn_blocks: list[str], rxn_ids: list[str] | None = None)¶

Write a RDF file from a list of reaction blocks.

Parameters¶

fTextIOWrapper

The file to write to.

rxn_blockslist[str]

The reaction blocks to write.

rxn_idslist[str], optional

The reaction IDs to use. Defaults to None. If None, sequential 5 digit numbers are used.
